News

✔ Jul-2020: I have been selected to attend the Oxford Machine Learning Summer School (OxML 2020) to be held in August. Excited to attend!

✔ Jul-2020: Had a great time attending the amazing Eastern European Machine Learning Summer School (EEML 2020)!

✔ Jun-2020: Our paper “Resource-Constrained Federated Learning with Heterogeneous Labels and Models” has been accepted at ACM KDD 2020 (AIoT ‘20).

✔ Sep-2019: Our paper “A Dynamically Adaptive Movie Occupancy Forecasting System with Feature Optimization” has been accepted at IEEE ICDM 2019 (LMID ‘19).

✔ Sep-2019: Our paper “Label Frequency Transformation for Multi-Label Multi-Class Text Classification” has been accepted at KONVENS 2019 (GermEval ‘19).

✔ Jul-2019: Our paper “A Vision-based Deep On-Device Intelligent Bus Stop Recognition System” has been accepted at ACM UbiComp 2019 (PURBA ‘19).

✔ Apr-2019: Our work on “Handling Real-time Unlabeled Data in Activity Recognition using Deep Bayesian Active Learning and Data Programming” has been presented at MobiUK 2019, University of Oxford .

✔ May-2019: Our paper “ActiveHARNet: Towards On-Device Deep Bayesian Active Learning for Human Activity Recognition” has been accepted at ACM MobiSys 2019 (EMDL ‘19).

✔ Feb-2019: Joined Global AI Accelerator (GAIA), Ericsson R&D as a Data Scientist, broadly working on solving ML problems in telecom and IoT.

✔ May-2018: Joined SmartCardia (EPFL) as a Machine Learning Engineer, working on AI assisted wearable health-care.

✔ May-2018: Our paper “HARNet: Towards On-Device Incremental Learning using Deep Ensembles on Constrained Devices” has been accepted at ACM MobiSys 2018 (EMDL ‘18).

✔ Apr-2017: Presented our paper “A Generic Multi-modal Dynamic Gesture Recognition System using Machine Learning” at the IEEE FICC 2018 (Future for Information and Communication Conference), Singapore.
